item.description: An Untrusted Pointer Dereference can occur while doing USB control transfers, if multiple requests of different standard request categories like device, interface & endpoint are made together. in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music, Snapdragon Wearables
